title: Ashai Aghum
sahitya:
Ashai Aghum pishAcukku aDimaiyAghum manamE nI mOsam pOghAmal ini murugadAsanAgi viDu


anupallavi

  mAsu paDiya unakku mayakkam UTTi pAsha valaiyil mATTi pADupaDa vATTiDum


caraNam    yOcikkAmal aruLai yAcippOrkku uDanE vIsi aruL kumarEsha vIramikka kEsariyai
nEsa vishvAsattODu nI aNugit-tuNai tEDu kAsini adanil sukhavAsa pEru pera nADu
